name: yieldify-ball-app
description: bouncing ball app for yieldify technical interview

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && minify src/bouncing-ball.js > dist/bouncing-ball.min.js && minify src/bouncing-ball.html > dist/bouncing-ball.min.html && minify src/styles.css > dist/styles.min.css

author: Haydn Welch
